title: JSON schema for HTMLHint configuration files

alt-require.description: Alt of img must be present and alt of area[href] and input[type=image] must be set value.

attr-no-duplication.description: The same attribute can't be specified twice.

attr-unsafe-chars.description: Attribute value cant not use unsafe chars.

attr-value-double-quotes.description: Attribute value must closed by double quotes.

head-script-disabled.description: The script tag can not be used in head.

href-abs-or-rel.description: Href must be absolute or relative.

id-class-ad-disabled.description: Id and class can not use ad keyword, it will blocked by adblock software.

id-class-value.description: Id and class value must meet some rules: underline, dash, hump.

id-unique.description: ID attributes must be unique in the document.

space-tab-mixed-disabled.description: Spaces and tabs can not mixed in front of line.

src-not-empty.description: Src of img(script,link) must set value. Emtpy of src will visit current page twice.

style-disabled.description: Style tag can not be used.

tag-self-close.description: The empty tag must closed by self.
